thread.title: Water department worker critically injured in Northwest Side trench collapse
thread.title_full: Water department worker critically injured in Northwest Side trench collapse

author: Peter Nickeas
title: Water department worker critically injured in Northwest Side trench collapse
text:
Water department worker critically injured in Northwest Side trench collapse Ambulance Tribune photo illustration Tribune photo illustration Peter Nickeas in "very critical condition," said Cmdr. Curtis Hudson, a spokesman for the Chicago Fire Department. 
"He was working in the hole, and the hole collapsed on him," he said. 
The man injured was a worker for the city water department, according to Gary Litherland, a spokesman for the department. 
Other details weren't immediately available. Check back for more information.
